originalText.text: This 2 hour workshop has totally transformed my approach to my inbox.  I already after only a few days feel more in control of my day and less stressed .

text.text: This 2 hour workshop has totally transformed my approach to my inbox.  I already after only a few days feel more in control of my day and less stressed .

originalText.text: I recently began using The Stack Method again after struggling for a few years without it. In my previous role, my entire team used Stack and it helped us all stay in synch. It also helped us build a culture of responsiveness, follow-through, and clear communication. Now that I'm using it in my new role, I feel more organized, clear-headed, and productive. I can't wait for the rest of my team to adopt it. I recommend Stack and all Double Gemini's services without reservation.

originalText.text:
Anya S. is very knowledgeable and detailed in her walkthrough during the STACK Setup Workshop.

My inbox transformed from having thousands of filtered unread junk emails to Inbox Zero within the day. The structure led to significant time saved and freed up mental space. Having a fully optimized Inbox greatly enhanced my day to day efficiency and effectiveness.

Thanks Anya and STACK team.

originalText.text: Taking the Stack Method training allowed me to realize the benefits of making this a habit.  There are a ton of efficiencies to be had and many anxieties to be reduced by adopting this process.  The training was engaging and well-paced while highlighting all of the benefits of the method using great data points.
